name: Bull!
description:
Break vases to score points, avoid the guards.  Let me know your high scores.

Arrow Keys Left and Right to move Left and Right (If you hit a wall you also change directions)

Up Arrow to Jump

Down Arrow to go down

Space bar to poop, Poop kills the guards, two poop limit, you can poop again when the poop despawns

R to Restart

Made in one day for NOKIA JAM 5.
